summary.title: Secure Flood Rescue System using MQTT
summary.description: This system uses IoT-centric technology to implement emergency communication during floods. Survivors communicate their GPS positions and threat levels through a mobile application via drones. The relayed messages are sent to the cloud-based MQTT broker where they are saved in the database and visualized on a dashboard (Grafana) for the responding units. User devices, drone MQTT brokers (in bridge mode), central cloud MQTT broker, SQL databases, and visual KPI dashboards are some of the device-centric components of the system.

data.name: Disaster Response System
data.description: A Mosquitto MQTT broker running on a drone, operating in bridge mode to forward messages to the cloud.

data.name: Victim (App User)
data.description: A person in the disaster zone using the rescue app to send distress messages.

threats.title: Traceable Actor Participation
threats.description: Actors' activities may be logged in a way that removes plausible deniability and creates surveillance risks.
threats.mitigation: Limit persistent logging or anonymize logs when possible.

data.name: CMC Operator
data.description: The person who monitors the dashboard and coordinates rescue efforts.

threats.title: Traceable Actor Participation
threats.description: Actors' activities may be logged in a way that removes plausible deniability and creates surveillance risks.
threats.mitigation: Limit persistent logging or anonymize logs when possible.

data.name: Field Response Team
data.description: The team that receives commands from the dashboard and goes to rescue victims.

threats.title: Traceable Actor Participation
threats.description: Actors' activities may be logged in a way that removes plausible deniability and creates surveillance risks.
threats.mitigation: Limit persistent logging or anonymize logs when possible.

data.name: SQL Database
data.description: Stores survivor messages sent from the rescue app, including severity level and GPS data.

threats.title: Improper Data Retention
threats.description: Stored data is kept beyond its necessary duration or without proper consent, risking regulatory non-compliance.
threats.mitigation: Apply automated data retention policies and obtain clear consent.

data.name: Rescue App
data.description: Mobile application used by victims to send distress signals (location + severity level) via MQTT.

threats.title: Drone Message Identifiability
threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.

data.name: MQTT Bridge Broker
data.description: A Mosquitto broker running on drones in bridge mode, forwarding MQTT messages from survivors to the central broker in the cloud.

threats.title: Drone Message Identifiability
threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.

data.name: MQTT Central Broker
data.description: Cloud-hosted Mosquitto broker that receives messages from edge drones and publishes them to the integration service.

threats.title: Drone Message Identifiability
threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.

data.name: Cloud Integration Service
data.description: A backend Python service that subscribes to MQTT messages and inserts them into the SQL database.

threats.title: Drone Message Identifiability
threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.

data.name: Graphics
data.description: Generates visuals like maps and severity overlays from survivor data.

threats.title: Drone Message Identifiability
threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.

threats.title: Unencrypted MQTT Communication
threats.description: MQTT message payloads are transmitted without encryption, exposing sensitive victim location and health data to potential eavesdropping.
threats.mitigation: Use TLS to encrypt all MQTT communications.

threats.title: Topic-Based Message Linkability
threats.description: Consistent MQTT topics allow attackers to correlate messages and infer user behavior or ongoing operations.
threats.mitigation: Randomize or obfuscate topic structures and minimize persistent identifiers.

data.name: MQTT Command Rx
data.description: Listens for command messages (e.g., dispatch instructions) and triggers corresponding actions in the system.

threats.title: Drone Message Identifiability
threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.

data.name: MQTT Rx
data.description: Subscribes to MQTT topics to receive and process incoming messages like victim data or rescue updates.

threats.title: Drone Message Identifiability
threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.

data.name: MQTT Tx
data.description: Publishes messages (e.g., rescue requests, sensor data) to the MQTT broker for system-wide distribution.

threats.title: Drone Message Identifiability
threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.

data.name: Drone Command
data.description: Sends operator commands to drones via MQTT.

threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.

data.name: Query
data.description: Pulls filtered survivor data from the SQL Database.

threats.description: Drone message payloads may include metadata that can be linked to specific victims or responders.
threats.mitigation: Minimize metadata and use pseudonyms for message identifiers.
